title: 2008 Ford F250 Utility Truck
item_description:
2008 Ford F250 Utility Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 2008
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F250XL Super Duty
  • VIN: 1FDSX20508ED08355
  • License: N/A **
    • The plate was Removed by the Seller, Buyer will need to apply for new plates 
    • Registration Expiration: Exempt (prior use as a city-owned vehicle). 
  • Odometer Reads: 67,519 (updated on preview day)
    • 67,494 (previous)
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 9,200 LBS
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 5.4L
  • Body Style: Utility Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT245/75R17
  • Deck Length: 97”
  • Deck Width: 48”
  • Wall Height: 24”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Tan

Note: Title or Application for Replacement Title and (REG 262) Transfer Form, and smog certificate, will be mailed within 2 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, inspections, transfer, taxes, application of new license plates, and fees due to the DMV. **This vehicle is a city-owned vehicle and is exempt from registration. However, once the new buyer completes the transfer of title, the registration will no longer be exempt.
